Question: This person, for his part, continued to the northern coast of Hispaniola, where he landed on 5 December.
Hints: The World Columbian Exposition in Chicago, 1893, commemorated the 400th anniversary of the landing of this person in the Americas.
For one year this person and his men remained stranded on Jamaica.
In 1485, this person presented his plans to John II, King of Portugal.
